an3.146:1.1: “Someone with three qualities is cast down to hell.
an3.146:1.3: Unskillful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.146:1.4: Someone with these three qualities is cast down to hell.
an3.146:2.1: Someone with three qualities is raised up to heaven.
an3.146:2.3: Skillful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.146:2.4: Someone with these three qualities is raised up to heaven.”
